insert into tbl_attendance ( progress_id, status, times, createAt )
values ( #{progressId}, #{status}, #{times}, now() )
mapper.select:
select pr.title, ps.child_name, a.status, a.times
from tbl_attendance as a
left join tbl_progress as ps on a.progress_id = ps.progress_id left join tbl_lesson as l on ps.lesson_id = l.lesson_id left join tbl_program as pr on l.program_id = pr.program_id
where ps.parent_id = #{parent_id}
group by attendance_id
